properties.name: ExcludeUppercase
properties.description: Specifies that the generated password should not include uppercase letters. The default behavior is False, and the generated password can include uppercase letters.

type.description: Specifies that the generated password should not include uppercase letters. The default behavior is False, and the generated password can include uppercase letters.

properties.name: RequireEachIncludedType
properties.description: Specifies whether the generated password must include at least one of every allowed character type. By default, Secrets Manager enables this parameter, and the generated password includes at least one of every character type.

type.description: Specifies whether the generated password must include at least one of every allowed character type. By default, Secrets Manager enables this parameter, and the generated password includes at least one of every character type.

properties.name: IncludeSpace
properties.description: Specifies that the generated password can include the space character. By default, Secrets Manager disables this parameter, and the generated password doesn't include space

type.description: Specifies that the generated password can include the space character. By default, Secrets Manager disables this parameter, and the generated password doesn't include space

properties.name: ExcludeCharacters
properties.description: A string that excludes characters in the generated password. By default, all characters from the included sets can be used. The string can be a minimum length of 0 characters and a maximum length of 7168 characters.

type.description: A string that excludes characters in the generated password. By default, all characters from the included sets can be used. The string can be a minimum length of 0 characters and a maximum length of 7168 characters.

properties.name: GenerateStringKey
properties.description: The JSON key name used to add the generated password to the JSON structure specified by the SecretStringTemplate parameter. If you specify this parameter, then you must also specify SecretStringTemplate.

type.description: The JSON key name used to add the generated password to the JSON structure specified by the SecretStringTemplate parameter. If you specify this parameter, then you must also specify SecretStringTemplate.

properties.name: PasswordLength
properties.description: The desired length of the generated password. The default value if you do not include this parameter is 32 characters.

type.description: The desired length of the generated password. The default value if you do not include this parameter is 32 characters.

properties.name: ExcludePunctuation
properties.description: Specifies that the generated password should not include punctuation characters. The default if you do not include this switch parameter is that punctuation characters can be included.

type.description: Specifies that the generated password should not include punctuation characters. The default if you do not include this switch parameter is that punctuation characters can be included.

properties.name: ExcludeLowercase
properties.description: Specifies the generated password should not include lowercase letters. By default, ecrets Manager disables this parameter, and the generated password can include lowercase False, and the generated password can include lowercase letters.

type.description: Specifies the generated password should not include lowercase letters. By default, ecrets Manager disables this parameter, and the generated password can include lowercase False, and the generated password can include lowercase letters.

properties.name: SecretStringTemplate
properties.description: A properly structured JSON string that the generated password can be added to. If you specify this parameter, then you must also specify GenerateStringKey.

type.description: A properly structured JSON string that the generated password can be added to. If you specify this parameter, then you must also specify GenerateStringKey.

properties.name: ExcludeNumbers
properties.description: Specifies that the generated password should exclude digits. By default, Secrets Manager does not enable the parameter, False, and the generated password can include digits.

type.description: Specifies that the generated password should exclude digits. By default, Secrets Manager does not enable the parameter, False, and the generated password can include digits.

ReplicaRegion.description: A custom type that specifies a Region and the KmsKeyId for a replica secret.

properties.name: KmsKeyId
properties.description: The ARN, key ID, or alias of the KMS key to encrypt the secret. If you don't include this field, Secrets Manager uses aws/secretsmanager.

type.description: The ARN, key ID, or alias of the KMS key to encrypt the secret. If you don't include this field, Secrets Manager uses aws/secretsmanager.

properties.name: Region
properties.description: (Optional) A string that represents a Region, for example "us-east-1".

type.description: (Optional) A string that represents a Region, for example "us-east-1".

Tag.description: A list of tags to attach to the secret. Each tag is a key and value pair of strings in a JSON text string.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that's 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that's 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that's 1 to 256 characters in length.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that's 1 to 256 characters in length.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: (Optional) Specifies a user-provided description of the secret.

type.description: (Optional) Specifies a user-provided description of the secret.

properties.name: KmsKeyId
properties.description: (Optional) Specifies the ARN, Key ID, or alias of the AWS KMS customer master key (CMK) used to encrypt the SecretString.

type.description: (Optional) Specifies the ARN, Key ID, or alias of the AWS KMS customer master key (CMK) used to encrypt the SecretString.

properties.name: SecretString
properties.description: (Optional) Specifies text data that you want to encrypt and store in this new version of the secret.

type.description: (Optional) Specifies text data that you want to encrypt and store in this new version of the secret.

properties.name: GenerateSecretString
properties.description: (Optional) Specifies text data that you want to encrypt and store in this new version of the secret.

type.description: (Optional) Specifies text data that you want to encrypt and store in this new version of the secret.

properties.name: ReplicaRegions
properties.description: (Optional) A list of ReplicaRegion objects. The ReplicaRegion type consists of a Region (required) and the KmsKeyId which can be an ARN, Key ID, or Alias.

type.description: (Optional) A list of ReplicaRegion objects. The ReplicaRegion type consists of a Region (required) and the KmsKeyId which can be an ARN, Key ID, or Alias.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: The list of user-defined tags associated with the secret. Use tags to manage your AWS resources. For additional information about tags, see TagResource.

type.description: The list of user-defined tags associated with the secret. Use tags to manage your AWS resources. For additional information about tags, see TagResource.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The friendly name of the secret. You can use forward slashes in the name to represent a path hierarchy.

type.description: The friendly name of the secret. You can use forward slashes in the name to represent a path hierarchy.

properties.name: Id
properties.description: secret Id, the Arn of the resource.

type.description: secret Id, the Arn of the resource.
